feed.title: GitHub PHP Daily Trending

entry.title: cypht-org/cypht
entry.summary:
Cypht: Lightweight Open Source webmail aggregator [PHP, JS]. Supports IMAP/SMTP, JMAP and EWS (Exchange Web Services)

Cypht

https://cypht.org

All your email, from all your accounts, in one place. Supports IMAP/SMTP, JMAP and EWS. Cypht is like a news reader, but for E-mail. Cypht does not replace your existing accounts - it combines them into one. And it's also a news reader.

.

The driving force behind Cypht development is to provide combined views for multiple accounts, but it's also a standard E-mail client that lets you browse and manage IMAP folders and send outbound messages with SMTP.

Cypht is an application built entirely of plugins, or as we call them, module sets (which is obviously way cooler sounding than plugins), that are executed by the framework. Modules provide a flexible way to add new features or customize the program without hacking the code.

Installation instructions

  • All Cypht latest and master versions: https://cypht.org/install

Monthly community meetings: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/wiki/Monthly-Community-Meetings

Security details: https://cypht.org/security

Module info: https://cypht.org/modules

Features: https://cypht.org/features

License: https://cypht.org/license

Community chat room: https://gitter.im/cypht-org/community

For developers, get via Composer: https://packagist.org/packages/jason-munro/cypht

Docker: https://hub.docker.com/r/cypht/cypht

LinkedIn group: https://www.linkedin.com/groups/13804559/

An interview with the project's founder: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/wiki/AMA-Jason-Munro

âœ¨ Overview

Mirza Bot Panel is a feature-rich Telegram bot designed for selling VPN services for platforms like Marzban and 3x-ui panels. This bot simplifies the process of VPN subscription sales, enabling seamless automation, configuration building, and user management.

Mirza Panel comes in two versions:

  1. Free Version ğŸ†“: Offers basic functionalities to get started with VPN sales.
  2. Subscription Version ğŸ’: Provides advanced features for businesses looking for more customization, detailed analytics, and enhanced management options.

Whether youâ€™re offering trial accounts or managing large-scale VPN services, this bot covers everything you need to run a successful VPN business.

ğŸš€ Installation

Prerequisites

Ensure you have the following before installation:

  • ğŸ–¥ï¸ Ubuntu Server 22
  • ğŸŒ A Domain Name

ğŸ”§ Installing the Bot (Stable Version)

Run the following command in your server terminal:

curl -o install.sh -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahdiMGF2/botmirzapanel/main/install.sh && bash install.sh

When prompted, select option 1 to complete the installation.

âš ï¸ Beta Installation

ğŸ’¡ Disclaimer: This is a beta release. It may contain bugs or issues. Use it with caution and report any problems you encounter.

To install the beta version, run:

curl -o install.sh -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahdiMGF2/botmirzapanel/main/install.sh && bash install.sh -beta

ğŸ”„ updating bot

To update your bot to the latest version, use the following command:

curl -o install.sh -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahdiMGF2/botmirzapanel/main/install.sh && bash install.sh -update

âŒ removing

If you want to completely remove the bot from your server, run the following command:

curl -o install.sh -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mahdiMGF2/botmirzapanel/main/install.sh && bash install.sh

When prompted, select option 3 to remove the bot.
